评论详情: Super cute!  I love that it is all one piece so that it doesn't get scrunched up or disheveled!  Only cons are it does seem to run a little short (I just sized up), might be that I just have an extra long baby.  The other is that the snaps do not hold well, the outfit likes to go up a bit and then the snaps come undone, might be my baby's length again or that we cloth diaper (although it is nice and roomy around the diaper) but they are very easy to unsnap so I think they would work better if they were stronger snaps.
The quality is perfect other than it being a little tight where the diaper is and loose up at the top. For the money it was okay but it was definitely a one time use…
Super cute outfit we got for our daughter to wear on Thanksgiving. Got our 14 month old dressed and as soon as she squatted to play with her toys the seams ripped.

评论概述: I wish the buttons stayed closed!
评论详情: It fits perfectly and the bow is cute. The outfit is perfect except the buttons keep popping open! It would've been perfect if the buttons stayed shut.
This outfit is just as cute as in the picture.
The fit and quality are good. It is really cute and I love that it is a one piece. Great value for the money.

I ordered size 12 months for my granddaughter for her birthday because this is the size my daughter asked me to get for her. The colors are very bright and vibrant it is a beautiful outfit. It may run a little large. Very soft and comfortable. I do not know how well it will fold up because she has not wanted yet and I just purchased it in october.
Great quality. Bought for pumpkin patch pictures. So cute!
